body.name: Z-Edge 24.5" Gaming Monitor, Z-Edge UG25I FHD 1920x1080 240Hz Gaming Monitor, 1ms Frameless LED, AMD Freesync Premium Display Port HDMI Built-in Speakers
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 4 hrs 9 mins
features: [240Hz High Refresh Rate]Featuring rapid 240Hz refresh rate, this allows for a smoother, more responsive gaming experience with less motion blur. Low 1ms response time guarantees pixels on the screen can change color quickly, reducing motion blur and ghosting. Premium Free-sync technology can synchronize the gaming monitor's refresh rate with the graphics card's output, reducing screen tearing and stuttering during gameplay.

[Born for Gaming]FPS and RTS Game Modes are preset display settings built for an enhanced gaming experience. HDR technology allows for a wider range of colors and greater contrast, resulting in more vivid, lifelike images, this can enhance the gaming experience and provide a more immersive visual experience.

[Powerful and Strong Connections]Built-in two HDMI 2.0 inputs and one Display 1.4 port, you can connect Desktop PC, Gaming Laptops, Switch, XBOX, PS gaming console to the monitor. All of the ports support up to impressive 240Hz refresh rate, our gaming monitor can offer pro-level gaming experience for the users.

[Ergonomic and Sleek Design] Support VESA mount 75*75mm, it can be installed on the wall or a mounting arm at ease, freeing up desk space and providing greater flexibility in positioning the monitor. Three-sided edge to edge design makes full use of the screen, brings the modern and sleek look to this streamlined monitor, easy to expand your views in a dual-monitor setup.

[Eye-Care Technology] Flicker free and low blue light features keep your eyes fresh after prolonged use. FHD 1920x1080 resolution allows for clear and detailed visuals. The 1000:1 contrast ratio presents the deep blacks and brilliant whites, allowing you to capture more image details even in the dark.

What type of HDMI and DP port does it have? What refresh rate can this monitor run on HDMI and DP? The HDMI1 and HDMI2 ports are 2.0, DP port is 1.4, all of the ports can support 240Hz refresh rate. Can you attach a monitor arm to it? Yes, this monitor is VESA compatible, it has the VESA mount standard 75x75mm. Would this monitor be good for PS5? Yes this monitor will be a great option for the PS5. Our monitor has the HDMI 2.0 output so it can support PS5 for up to 120Hz at 1080P resolution. What are the dimensions of the monitor? The screen width is 22in, screen height with stand is 16.3in without the stand is 13in, screen depth with stand is 6.3in without the stand is 0.6in. Does it support HDR and Free Sync? Yes it does, please note that HDR requires HDMI port, and Free Sync requires DP port.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little monitors
reviews.reviewText: I bought two of these and have them mounted side by side in my hamshack. Both have a crisp display with good colors. No problems and priced right.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: amazing product If buying monitor, I prefer buying this one because its best quality and price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wonderful for gaming
reviews.reviewText: Bought as birthday present for grandson. He absolutely loves it. The resolution is great and the frame speed is fantastic. Highly recommend and now I’ll probably buy another one for another grandson. Fast shipping no issues with packaging.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars They’re not the best monitor I’ve ever seen but what do you want, they’re cheap.
reviews.reviewText: They work fine, the power cord is cheap and I’m sure they’re going to stop working at the most inopportune moment. But for now, they’re working fine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Better options available
reviews.reviewText: I purchased the 240hz 24.5 inch monitor. I was immediately dissatisfied with the picture quality, color, and cheapness of the monitor as well as the parts. This is not a good deal. There are many other 240hz options available for the same price. This is not a reputable product. Most of the reviews are free product vine users boosting the reputation. The sound quality is terrible. The sharpness is lacking. I wouldn’t even use this for work. The blurry image will give you a headache. I decided to return it after an hour of use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Loving It So Far
reviews.reviewText: I received mine today. It is hooked up to my xbox series x and my laptop as a 2nd montior. I absolutely love it so far, no complaints besides the volume. But thats an easy fix

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Monitor was very easy to install and connect. Screen is very clear, no glare and blue screen protection makes it very easy on the eyes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Bad quality monitor but decent for price
reviews.reviewText: This is a very cheap 240hz monitor. You get what you pay for. This monitor is indeed 240hz but the ghosting and trail is horrendous. My 144hz monitor is smoother. Do not buy this monitor, instead buy a quality 144hz one.

reviews.reviewerName: Good quality, good condition, but no serial number on the back of it products a scam wouldn’t recommend. If you’re looking to just buy one I would recommend buying two I wouldn’t
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Just buy one, don’t buy two if you want to download drivers on the monitor, there is no serial number to do so
YouTubeや、スポーツ観戦に使っているが、高額ゲーミングモニターと遜色無いかな。これ良いです。

reviews.reviewTitle: 何と！スピーカーも付いていた・・
reviews.reviewText: ８年前のフルHDモニターの交換で買いましたが、文字も見やすく良い買い物でした。何と！スピーカーも付いていたのですが残念音質なのでCreativeのスピーカーを使ってます。

reviews.reviewTitle: 値段の割に良いモニター
reviews.reviewText: この値段でこのクオリティーのモニターはありがたいただし電源アダプターや操作ボタン類は値段なりのチープさです設定したらイジらないで格安で視野角の広いIPSモニターを使いたい人にはありかもしれないモニターです
自宅で仕事する時ように。ノートパソコンの画面小さいのでモニターに映すと文字も見やすく効率アップ。
